current.article_unreal_text_descript:
𝐋𝐈𝐃𝐄𝐑 𝐉𝐄𝐀𝐍𝐒 𝐂𝐀𝐌𝐏𝐀𝐈𝐆𝐍 - '𝐇𝐢𝐭 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐆-𝐬𝐩𝐨𝐭'

LIDER Jeans is the area where LIDER constantly apply new technique in denim and keep pace with the latest trend in order to hit the untouched G-Spot of wearers. 
With the official release of the LIDER Jeans line, we at LIDER hope to offer the ultimate pleasure to wearers who style, hang out, work, live, and love in denim.
Experience the pleasure yourself with LIDER Jeans. All gender welcome at #LIDERCLUB.
current.article_concop-spring_text_descript:
🍌 Tan skin, messy hair, and a carefree spirit.
90% tan, 10% sunburnt, #absolutelylider
current.article_no33-fall_text_descript:
Bước vào thế giới quan của 'ỦA'  | Step into the 'ỦA' worldview
Introducing the 'ỦA' (meaning: Huhh?) worldview, from its humble beginnings to its present fancy world.
From its inception, ỦA has evolved into four distinct versions, each with its unique treatment:
✨ ỦA TEE in candy grey (grey and blush) 
✨ ỦA TEE in polka dot (red and white) 
✨ ỦA TEE in black leather (all black) 
✨ ỦA TEE in caramel blue (blue and beige)
current.article_your-new-fitted_text_descript:
For the 9th milestone, we recreated artworks from the past 9 years. So 𝒏𝒊𝒏𝒆 to meet them all again!
-
𝑵𝒊𝒏𝒆 to meet them though it was a bit 𝒍𝒆𝒊𝒈𝒉𝒕
Too many thoughts so many days
Three thousand two hundred and eighty five
Like I sometimes find
Something blooming
between black and white
from LIDERISM to
9th-year rewind.
current.article_your-new-fitted_text_footer_name: Nine to meet them all again! Shop Now.
current.article_ps_381_valentine_text_descript: CAPTURED IN SEVERAL YEARS LATER, THE POWER COUPLE HAS GIVEN BIRTH TO THE CHILD NAMED THE TIFF DRACO, FIRST APPEARED IN LIDER IN 2024.
current.article_aophat-ra-tieng_text_title: LIDER X LOCO - Less Stress More LOCO Campaign
current.article_aophat-ra-tieng_text_descript:
☞ Chỉ định: Phù hợp với các anh chị em một lòng một dạ với tư bản, có hiếu với khách hàng và mang nợ nghiệp với đồng nghiệp.
☞ HDSD: Buổi sáng một liều mặc đẹp từ LIDER, tan ca một liều nhạc cực sung từ LOCO.

Nhanh tay giải nhiệt ngay hè này bằng liệu pháp chữa lành từ LIDER X LOCO, để thưởng thức trọn vẹn những ngày hè thoải mái và vui vẻ.
